name: Cyber Olympiad
info: This exam tests knowlege of computers and IT.
author: Eklavya Sharma

sections.name: Objective
sections.info: This section has MCQs which have exactly one correct answer.
sections.comment: Questions in this section have been taken from MTG's book to prepare for SOF's NCO (National Cyber Olympiad) 2010

questions.title: HTML tags
questions.text: HTML tags must be written within:
In Telnet, the client computer is called
The IP address code does not contain
The processing speed of a computer is measured in

questions.title: database
questions.text: Which of the following features distinguishes a database file from a mere collection of data?

options.text: Database enables data to be organised for effective use much faster

options: It organizes data into rows and columns
It gives reference name to each file it creates

sections.name: Subjectve
sections.info: Give full form or one-word answers for questions in this section. Checking is case-insensitive. Only use alphanumeric characters or space
sections.comment: Questions in this section are from old NCOs

questions.text: A program which converts a high-level language into machine language is called a ____
What is the full form of URL?
What is the full form of HTTP?
What is the full form of SSL?
